content: 1 single_crochet 5 times in center point ** 1sc 1 double_crochet 1 single_crochet in chain 3 space ** repeat from ** to ** to corner of shawl 5 single_crochet in corner st * 3 single_crochet in space created by chain 5 or treble_crochet on shawl * * repeat from * to * to center of shawl slip_stitch into 1st single_crochet end off weave ends in hint it may help you to keep track of your increase in the center if you mark it with a safety pin or other marker very easy to get crocheting along and forget to increase you do not need to move the marker every row just every 4th or 5th row would allow you to see where you are in your repetitions created and designed by kathryn a white www crochetnbeads com all patterns may be duplicated for private use but not for resale october 3rd 2005 2
